description: It's no secret among Sanctuary members that Kyle King envies Vince Ferelli's bulging muscles. King regularly stalks Ferelli through the dark corridors waiting for his chance to worship the 225 lb. bodybuilder. When King finds his prey flexing on the St. Andrew's Cross he falls to his knees and takes Ferelli's cock in his mouth. Ferelli dominates the younger stud and fucks him hard; but King isn't satisfied. He turns the tables on his demigod by eating his ass and fucking his hole. Both muscle-crazed hunks drain their loads on the Sanctuary floor.
title: Sanctuary 2
